code: import qs from'qs';import client from'./client';export var writePost=function writePost(_ref){var title=_ref.title,body=_ref.body,tags=_ref.tags;return client.post('/api/posts',{title:title,body:body,tags:tags});};export var readPost=function readPost(id){return client.get("/api/posts/".concat(id));};export var listPosts=function listPosts(_ref2){var page=_ref2.page,username=_ref2.username,tag=_ref2.tag;var queryString=qs.stringify({page:page,username:username,tag:tag});return client.get("/api/posts?".concat(queryString));};export var updatePost=function updatePost(_ref3){var id=_ref3.id,title=_ref3.title,body=_ref3.body,tags=_ref3.tags;return client.patch("api/posts/".concat(id),{title:title,body:body,tags:tags});};export var removePost=function removePost(id){return client.delete("/api/posts/".concat(id));};
